meanings.definition: A person or group that supervises or controls a process or activity.
meanings.sent1: The regulators ensured everyone followed the rules at the event.
meanings.sent2: The government regulators oversee the safety of food production.
meanings.sent3: The regulators at the party made sure everyone had a good time.
meanings.sent4: She acted as the regulators of the team, keeping everyone in line.
meanings.sent5: The strict regulators of the school made sure students behaved well.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism that controls or maintains a specified characteristic within a system.
meanings.sent1: The temperature regulators in the house kept it warm during winter.
meanings.sent2: The speed regulators on the machine prevent it from going too fast.
meanings.sent3: The regulators in the car decided it was time for a road trip.
meanings.sent4: The air conditioning unit acted as the regulators of the room's temperature.
meanings.sent5: The water regulators in the shower help control the flow for a comfortable bath.

meanings.definition: A gene that controls the activity of another gene.
meanings.sent1: The regulators in the DNA sequence determine the expression of traits.
meanings.sent2: The genetic regulators play a crucial role in the development of organisms.
meanings.sent3: The regulators in the genetic code decided the color of the flower.
meanings.sent4: The gene regulators act like traffic lights, directing the flow of genetic information.
meanings.sent5: The regulators in the cell ensure genes are activated at the right time.
